WHO IS

1SaleRX?

is changing the face of online shopping for brand and certified generic prescription medications by offering the absolute lowest prices on the medicines consumers truly want and need.

Built solely with the intention to provide consumers with spectacular discounts. Our service is new and innovative but our experience is venerable but simple that brings delight to consumers with high quality brand and generic medications 1SaleRX flash sales offer something new every week, with limited time sales bringing an added layer of excitement. All of this has made 1SaleRX the destination for those who seek great prices and just as importantly, those who enjoy saving money.

Now, 1SaleRX is looking to position itself for the future by building a service-centric brand dedicated to keeping its customers happy and loyal, at prices that make prescription medications affordable
